original_text: The king of Israel and Jehoshaphat, the king of Judah, were each sitting on their thrones. They were wearing their royal clothes. They sat near the threshing floor at Samaria's city gate. All the prophets stood in front of them and they were speaking messages from God.
korean_text: 이스라엘의 왕과 유다의 여호사밧 왕이 왕복을 입고 사마리아 성문 어귀 광장에서 각기 왕좌에 앉아 있고 모든 선지자가 그들의 앞에서 예언을 하고 있는데

sentences.original_text: and Jehoshaphat, the king of Judah
were each sitting on their thrones.
They were wearing their royal clothes.
They sat near the threshing floor
All the prophets stood in front of them
sentences.korean_translation: 모든 선지자들은 그들 앞에 서 있었다

sentences.original_text: and they were speaking messages from God.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 하나님의 메시지를 말하고 있었다.
